p: However, as we have shown, simple, transparent and systematic approaches to incorporate additional considerations are within reach, and, more importantly, can produce allocations that could lead to more buy-in than the 2021 single-indicator-oriented approach. To further support future negotiations and increase accessibility of our framework, we have developed an online tool that can be used to visualize all results discussed here (in the context of the EU negotiations) and investigate the implications of user-defined weightings of all interpretations on eventual emissions allocations. The tool can be accessed online at https://wegcenter.uni-graz.at/effort-sharing/.
